https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hEeuCjUnGFCPdHbHFUUGGsCIrNt.jpg An aspiring writer investigates the murder of a local woman, who was allegedly killed by her husband but things take a nasty turn after his wife turns up dead at the same spot. A Kind of Murder
